user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to prepare a detailed performance and budget report for me (mark@optitech.solutions). Instruct her to review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Performance & Budget Report Preparation

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please prepare a detailed performance and budget report for me at your earliest convenience? When compiling the report, kindly review the relevant information in your Gmail and our Notion workspace to ensure it’s comprehensive and up to date.

Thank you very much for your assistance.

Best regards,  
Mark  
Head of Software Development  
OptiTech Solutions  
mark@optitech.solutions

final_output:
